subject: Re: [junit] Re: Another question about a JUnit test
msgSnippet: ... ... which is when test dependencies come in handy: you only need to run loadFile() once. -- Cédric [Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
messageBody:
On Thu, Aug 26, 2010 at 1:10 PM, tcdmail <tcdmail@...> wrote:

> Just want to add a sidenote, suppose also that if you want to test
> "readFile" you need to include almost all code from method "loadFile" in
> order to be able to test everything
>

... which is when test dependencies come in handy: you only need to run
loadFile() once.

--
Cédric
